attributes.action: Get hairdressers back as soon as possible
attributes.additional_details: Allow us back to work now! We are following all the guidelines. Why are opticians and dentists allowed to work when we can’t?
attributes.background: Hairdressers are an important part of society snd we need to be back working

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408

The Government has stated that  personal care premises such as hairdressers and nail salons will be allowed to reopen in Step 2 of it's roadmap for easing restrictions, which will happen no sooner than 12 April: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-response-spring-2021/covid-19-response-spring-2021-summary#roadmap-out-of-lockdown
